All Classes

Class Description
Action
Actions a Client can execute during its turn
ActionAnimation
3D object, it shows that a certain action can be done on a tile (position) on the SubScene
ActionController
Handles the action requests and replies (during the "GAME" state of the controller).
ActionMessage  
ActionUpdateMessage  
Ansi
Utility class; methods used to color Strings with ANSI characters (extended) - works only on supported terminals
ApolloRules
Rules for a player with Apollo as God
ArgsParser
Parser for the the characters passed from the command line
ArtemisRules
Rules for a player with Artemis as God
AthenaRules  
AtlasRules
Rules for a player with Atlas as God
Board
Game map, contains 25 tiles and unique for a session, also contains the workers during the game
BoardCamera
Camera of the 3D board
BoardController
Board screen FXML controller - its FXML contains a SubScene where the 3D objects are loaded
BoardCoordinates3D
Coordinates on the 3D board.
BoardObj
3D object representing the board on the 3D SubScene
BoardScene
SubScene containing 3D objects; shown on the BoardController scene
CantActException
Exception thrown if the worker can't perform the action requested
ChallengerSelectionController
Challenger screen FXML controller
ChallengerSelectionController.GodWindow
A frame containing the image of a god
Check
Checks used on all the gods actions consents
Cli
Client run on console (CLI)
Client  
ClientApp
Executable class, it starts the client
ClientConnection  
ClientConnection.ClientMessageReceiver  
CliScene
Class used by the CLI to create and print the scenes on the Terminal.
Colors
Available colors; each player can choose its own, at a given Session a color can't be assigned to more than one player
CommonRules
Rules shared by most of the gods
DemeterRules
Rules for a player with Demeter as God
DisconnectionController
Disconnection window (shown only if interrupted forcibly) FXML controller
DtoBoard
Dto copy of board.
DtoPosition
Dto copy of Position.
DtoSession
Dto copy of Session.
DtoTile
Dto copy of tile The Dto classes are created and stored in some messages exchanged on the network, their methods consist of only getters and all their variables are final
DtoWorker
Dto copy of Worker.
EnemyRules
Rules shared by the gods which apply extra checks to enemies
EventRules
Rules shared by the gods which rely on flags to choose the possible actions
FlagMessage  
GameState
Different phases of the game, used both on Client and Controller to tune the game flow
GenericController
FXML controller containing methods shared or used by all the windows
GodRules
Rules shared by all the gods
Gods
Gods implemented in the game
GodSelectionController
Gods selection screen FXML controller
Gui
JavaFx application extension
GuiManager
Client with graphical interface (GUI)
Height
Constants of height for the towers
HephaestusRules
Rules for a player with Hephaestus as God
HeraRules  
HestiaRules
Rules for a player with Hestia as God
LobbyController
Controller state on lobby
LobbyController
Lobby screen FXML controller
LobbyUpdate  
Message  
MessageType
Different types of messages used to exchange information between Client and Server
MinotaurRules
Rules for a player with Minotaur as God
NodeOperation
Utility class with static methods used by the 3D objects
NotInstantiableClass
Exception thrown if the constructor of a class not instantiable is called
Observable<T>
It's necessary for the communication between Model, Controller, View.
ObservableTileEvent
Observable position, notifies when a Tile/Worker/Animation is clicked on the board coordinates (x,y)
Observer<T>
Observer Interface, is necessary for the communication between Model, Controller, View.
PanRules
Rules for a player with Pan as God
Player
Used to represent a person (identified by his username) playing the game in a session with a unique color, a chosen god and a list of workers
PoseidonRules
Rules for a player with Poseidon as God
Position
Used as coordinates holder by Worker and indirectly links it to a Tile
PrometheusRules
Rules for a player with Prometheus as God
RegistrationMessage  
ReloadGame
Utility class that reloads the game from a save file
RemoteView
Remote view, posing as View in the MVC pattern
SaveData
Utility class that saves the game in a save file
SelectionController
Controller state used during the selection of each player god and the starter player
Server
Server; manages the connection/reconnection/disconnection of any ServerConnection
ServerApp
Executable class, it starts the server
ServerConnection
Connection of the RemoteView on Server side.
Session
Session of the game containing the list of the players, the board and the list of the gods
SessionController
Controller of the MVC.
SpecialPower
Implemented by the gods with an actionable a special power
StateController
Class of methods and variables shared by the Controller states.
StateUpdateMessage  
Target
Possible relationships between two workers
Tile
Tile of the game map, 25 of them and are initialized when a board is created
TileObj
3D object representing a tile on the 3D SubScene
TitleController
Starting (title) screen FXML controller
TowerObj
3D object representing the tower of a tile on the 3D SubScene
TrackedGroup
Group of 3D objects on the board subScene
TritonRules
Rules for a player with Triton as God
TurnController
Controller state used during the game.
View
Interface of methods used to handle the inputs and outputs independently from the implementation.
Worker
Used as a piece placed on the board and moved by a player, it can perform certain actions
WorkerObj
3D object representing a worker on the 3D SubScene
WrongActionException
Exception thrown if a player tries to execute an action not available
ZeusRules
Rules for a player with Zeus as God
